tuv.seg: 140, 24906, AKA, Amazon, Attribute, Backup, Command-line, Consumer, CRUD, Demand-crud, Fee, Flag, Flagged, Founders, Free, Friend, Fulfil, IM, List-demands-private, List-demands-public, List-proposal, List-store, List-tag, MI, Note, Object, Rate, Register, Register-link, Register-retailer, Register-salesassociate, Register-store, Reserve, Reserved, Retailer, Salesassociate, Sentiment, Settle, Settled, State-flow, Twitter
@{0} To protect your privacy, Follow Twetailer and then send your request via Direct Messages - like requesting help with "d twetailer ?"
The System encountered an unexpected error! {1}| If your issue cannot be fixed with another message, please report the error with the incident identifier: 323-{0}.
The Action {0} is not recognized by the System. Send '!help action' for the list of available actions.
The Action {0} is not allowed by your profile. Send '!help {0}' for the list of available actions.
The Cancel command requires a Demand Reference. Send '!help cancel' for more information.
The Demand identifier specified with the Cancel Command is invalid.
The Cancel Command has no effect of the Demand reference:{0} being in the state:{1}.
The Proposition identifier specified with the Cancel Command is invalid.
The Cancel Command has no effect of the Proposal reference:{0} being in the state:{1}.
The Demand identifier specified with the Close Command is invalid.
The Close Command has no effect of the Demand reference:{0} being in the state:{1}.

Thank you for closing Demand reference:{0}. Twetailer will update everyone's Ratings shortly. | Looking forward to the next opportunity where we can broker Consumer Demand with local Retailers' available Supply - via tweets, for f(r)ee. | Regards, The Twetailer Community.

Demand reference:{0} has been closed by the Consumer. | In order to improve your Twetailer Rating, please remember to finalize your Proposal by sending ... | "d twetailer !close proposal:{1}", or, "d twetailer !flag proposal:{1} note:[enter your issue here]"
The Proposition identifier specified with the Close Command is invalid.
The Close Command has no effect of the Proposal reference:{0} being in the state:{1}.

Thank you for closing Proposal:{0}. Twetailer will update everyone's Ratings shortly. | Looking forward to the next opportunity where we can broker Consumer Demand with local Retailers' available Supply - via tweets, for f(r)ee. | Regards, The Twetailer Community.

Proposal:{0} has been closed by the Retailer. | In order to improve your Twetailer Rating, please remember to finalize your Demand by sending ... | "d twetailer !close ref:{1}", or, "d twetailer !flag ref:{1} note:[enter your issue here]"
Only Proposals or Demands can be closed. Check '!help close' for more information.
The Proposition identifier specified with the Confirm Command is invalid.
The Demand reference:{1} is not in a state ({2}) that allows the Proposition proposal:{0} confirmation.

Thank you for confirming Proposal:{0} for Demand ref:{1}, tags:{2} | Store:{3}, {4} will be notified and asked to keep you Demand, marked with ref:{1}, on the side for you. | Send "d twetailer !list store:{3}" for more details | In order to improve your Twetailer Rating, please remember to finalize your Demand after visiting the store by sending ... | "d twetailer !close ref:{1}", or, "d twetailer !flag ref:{1} note:[enter your issue here]"

Confirming Proposal:{0} Tags:{1} | Please prepare product:{2} by marking it with Demand ref:{2} and placing it on the side.| In order to improve your Twetailer Rating, please remember to finalize your Proposal after the Consumer has visited your store by sending ... | "d twetailer !close ref:{2}", or, "d twetailer !flag ref:{2} note:[enter your issue here]"

Information:| If this were not a #demo, then you would proceed to the store and pick up your product.| At that point either you, or, the Sales Associate, would issue the !close command and the other would be prompted to do the same.| Now the robot is going to close the demand to simulate the delivery and for you to experience the full transaction cycle.
The Proposition identifier specified with the Confirm Command is invalid.
Now that Proposal:{0} has been declined, you won't be notified about any related updates.
The Proposition identifier specified with the Decline Command is invalid.
Only Proposals or Demands can be declined. Check '!help decline' for more information.

The Delete action can only be applied to Demands in the state:cancelled. Your Demand reference:{0} is in the state:{1}.| Please cancel the proposition first with '!cancel reference:{0}'. Check '!help delete' for more information.
That Demand reference:{0} has been marked for deletion. It will be garbage collected in a near future. In the meanwhile, it is no more accessible.
The Proposition identifier specified with the Delete Command is invalid.

The Delete action can only be applied to Proposals in the state:cancelled. Your Proposal:{0} is in the state:{1}.| Please cancel the proposition first with '!cancel proposal:{0}'. Check '!help delete' for more information.
That Proposal:{0} has been marked for deletion. It will be garbage collected in a near future. In the meanwhile, it is no more accessible.
The Proposition identifier specified with the Delete Command is invalid.
Only Proposals or Demands can be deleted. Check '!help delete' for more information.

The Range ({1}km) for the Demand reference:{0} is too small. It should be greater than {2}km.

The Range ({1} mi) for the Demand reference:{0} is too small. It should be greater than {2} miles.
The Range ({1} mi) for the Demand reference:{0} is too big. Twetailer offers its services only on Earth for now.
Your Demand reference:{0} should concern at least one item.
Please update the Demand reference:{0} with your Locale(postal/zip code and country) - like "ref:{0} locale:12345 us"

The Locale information for Demand reference:{0} cannot be retrieved. Please provide them another time (postal/zip code and country).

The hash tag (#) concept is reserved for a future feature. For now, only the "#demo" tag is accepted.| Other values are ignored. You can add them to the proposal tag list with "!demand ref:{0} {1}"| Send "? demo" for help on the demo mode, and join the Twetailer community to get more details about future enhancements.
The Locale given for the Command "{0}" cannot be resolved.| Please provide a valid Locale(postal/zip code and country)"

I have Demand ref:{0}, for tags:{1} which expires:{2}. If you have matching supply, please complete and send the following proposal ... | "d twetailer !propose ref:{0} product:[enter full product name here] price:[enter retail price here]"

I have Demand ref:{0}, for tags:{1}, quantity:{3} which expires:{2}. If you have matching supply, please complete and send the following proposal ...| "d twetailer !propose ref:{0} product:[enter full product name here] price:[enter retail price here]"
Your Proposition proposal:{0} should have at least one Tag.
Your Proposition proposal:{0} should concern at least one item.
Your Proposition proposal:{0} should have a unit retail Price and the Total cost which includes all taxes and service fees.
Your Proposition proposal:{0} should reference a Demand (with reference:[id]).

You can add them to the proposal tag list with "!propose proposal:{0} {1}"| Send "? demo" for help on the demo mode, and join the Twetailer community to get more details about future enhancements.
